fertilizeCrop(Player) - Method in class MyFarm.FarmLot
Checks if player can use his fertilize the current lot If player is able to fertilize, the player will gain experience The crop of the current lot would have its fertilizer level increased Displays the success of the action through a String The String also includes HTML styling String returned is intended to be received by the addNotif() function that is found in the FarmFrame class
